title: BRIEF-Axel Springer, Prosieben take stkae in virtual reality group Jaunt VR
text:
BRIEF-Axel Springer, Prosieben take stkae in virtual reality group Jaunt VR Sept 21 
Sept 21 Axel Springer says 
* Axel Springer and Prosiebensat.1 acquire shares in American virtual reality specialist Jaunt VR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Trending On Reuters
